name: quotation name in sales invoice
script:
for item in doc.items:
    a = item.sales_order
    b = item.item_code
    quotation = frappe.db.sql(
        """SELECT prevdoc_docname FROM `tabSales Order Item` WHERE parent=%s AND item_code = %s""",
        (a, b)
    )

    # Check if the result is not empty before updating
    if quotation:
        prevdoc_docname = quotation[0][0]
        frappe.db.set_value('Sales Invoice Item', {'parent': doc.name, 'item_code': item.item_code}, 'prevdoc_docname', prevdoc_docname)
doc.reload()

name: sales invoice submit after update qty in quotation
script:
for item in doc.items:
    quotation_details = frappe.db.get_value("Quotation Item",
        {'parent': item.prevdoc_docname, "item_code":item.item_code},
        'invoice_qty'  # Adjust the fields as needed
    )
    quotation_detail = frappe.db.get_value("Quotation",
        {'name': item.prevdoc_docname},
        'total_invoice_qty'  # Adjust the fields as needed
    )
    
    # Check if the database queries returned valid values
    if quotation_details is not None:
        quotations_details = float(quotation_details)
    else:
        quotations_details = 0.0
    
    if quotation_detail is not None:
        sales_invoice_qty = float(quotation_detail)
    else:
        sales_invoice_qty = 0.0
    
    invoices_qty = float(item.qty)
    total_invoice = quotations_details + invoices_qty
    sales_total = float(doc.total_qty)
    quotation_invoice = sales_invoice_qty + sales_total
    
    quotation = frappe.db.set_value("Quotation Item", {"parent":item.prevdoc_docname, "item_code":item.item_code}, {"invoice_qty":total_invoice})

# Note: This should be outside the loop to update the total for the entire quotation
quotation = frappe.db.set_value("Quotation", {"name":item.prevdoc_docname}, {"total_invoice_qty":quotation_invoice})

name: after_cancel sales invoice qty change in quotation
script:
for item in doc.items:
    quotation_details = frappe.db.get_value("Quotation Item",
    {'parent': item.prevdoc_docname, "item_code":item.item_code},
    'invoice_qty'  # Adjust the fields as needed
    )
    quotation_detail = frappe.db.get_value("Quotation",
    {'name': item.prevdoc_docname},
    'total_invoice_qty'  # Adjust the fields as needed
    )
    quotations_details = float(quotation_details)
    invoices_qty = float(item.qty)
    total_invoice = quotations_details - invoices_qty
    sales_invoice_qty = float(quotation_detail or 0)
    sales_total = float(doc.total_qty)
    quotation_invoice = sales_invoice_qty - sales_total
    quotation = frappe.db.set_value("Quotation Item",{"parent":item.prevdoc_docname,"item_code":item.item_code},{"invoice_qty":total_invoice})
quotation = frappe.db.set_value("Quotation",{"name":item.prevdoc_docname},{"total_invoice_qty":quotation_invoice})

item_types
script:
item_type = frappe.form_dict["item_type"]
# print(item_type)  # Check the value and type of item_type

pipe = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, 'pipe')
sheet = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, 'sheets')
blustor = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, 'bluaster')
pillar = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, 'pillar')
item_202 = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, '202')
item_304 = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, '304')
item_316 = frappe.db.get_value('Item Type', item_type, '316')
pipe2 = str(pipe)
sheet2 = str(sheet)

blustor2 = str(blustor)
pillar2 = str(pillar)
item_202_1 = str(item_202)
item_304_1 = str(item_304)
item_316_1 = str(item_316)
            


frappe.response["pipe"]=pipe2
frappe.response["sheet"]=sheet2
frappe.response["blustor"]=blustor2
frappe.response["pillar"]=pillar2
frappe.response["item_202"]=item_202_1
frappe.response["item_304"]=item_304_1
frappe.response["item_316"]=item_316_1

name: barcode
script:
item_code = frappe.form_dict["item_code"]
uom_details = frappe.get_all('UOM Conversion Detail', filters={'parent': item_code, 'conversion_factor': ('!=', 1)}, fields='uom')

frappe.response["uom_details"] =uom_details

name: Quotation Submit Time Stock Entry Auto Create For Material Transfer
script:
warehouse_name = frappe.db.get_value("Warehouse", filters={'custom_is_party_warehouse': '1'}, fieldname='name')


# Create a new Stock Entry document
stock_entry = frappe.get_doc({
    'doctype': 'Stock Entry',
    'stock_entry_type': 'Material Transfer',
    'quotation_no':doc.name,
    'items': [],
})

# Add items to the Stock Entry document based on the items in doc
for item in doc.items:
    stock_entry.append('items', {
        'item_code': item.item_code,
        'qty': item.qty,
        't_warehouse': warehouse_name,
        's_warehouse': item.warehouse
        # Add other item details as needed
    })

# Insert the Stock Entry document
stock_entry.insert()

# Submit the Stock Entry document
stock_entry.submit()
